pkgmetadata.longdescription: Update and Manipulate Rd Documentation Objects // Functions for manipulation of Rd objects, including function reprompt() for updating existing Rd documentation for functions, methods and classes and function rebib() for import of references from 'bibtex' files. There is also a macro for importing 'bibtex' references which an be used in Rd files and 'roxygen' comments without importing this package.
